xwikidoc.name: AddConfirm
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.superadmin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.title: Contribute Content
xwikidoc.content:
#if($request.submit=="Cancel")
Your asset has been permanently deleted from our systems. Thank you for your interest we hope that you will contribute to Curriki some time in the future.
[Back to the Member's Home Page>Members.WebHome]
#else #set($amng = $xwiki.getPlugin("asset_manager")) #set($currDocName = $amng.createOrUpdateAssetFromRequest()) #set($nextStep = $request.get("nextStep")) #set($asset = $xwiki.getDocument($currDocName)) #if($asset.getSpace() == "AssetTemp")
#includeForm("AssetManager.${nextStep}")
#else $response.sendRedirect($asset.getURL()) #end #end
